boardgame.name: First Class: All Aboard the Orient Express!
First Class: Spanning en intrige in de Oriënt Express
First Class: Unterwegs im Orient Express
Primera Clase: Un viaje en el Orient Express
ファーストクラス
boardgame.description: In First Class: Unterwegs im Orient Express, players try to score as many fame points as possible by building a rich network of rails, by building luxurious train cars, or by serving well-paying passengers._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;First Class is a card game that feels more like a board game, and since each game is played with the base cards and two of five modules, the game offers lots of variety as not all elements are used in each playing._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Strategy Board Game Nominee
2017 International Gamers Award - General Strategy: Multi-player Nominee

Episode 4 - Games with Controversial Historical Topics

boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Garrett_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Games 562 - Tony Boydell and Reflections on 2016
The Game Pit: Episode 90 - Picking Over the Bones of Flatline, Ethnos, First Class and more...
WTG11 - The Board Game Leftovers Episode 2 : Great Western Trail, First Class, ZhanGuo, and News!
